scripts.build: npm run less && npm run build:ts
scripts.build:ts: tsconfig && npm run ts && npm run bundle
scripts.bundle: mkdirp app/dist && browserify app/src/main.js -d -t stringify -o app/dist/app.js -v
scripts.copy: mkdirp cordova/www && concurrent -r "npm run copy:dist" "npm run copy:fonts" "npm run copy:images" "npm run copy:index"
scripts.cordova: npm run deploy && npm run copy && plat cordova prepare && plat cordova build
scripts.deploy: npm run clean:dist && npm run build -- -- -- -p [minifyify --no-map]
scripts.watch:less: nodemon -w app -e less --exec npm run less
scripts.watch:ts: nodemon -w app -e ts --exec npm run build:ts
